genre_description: A solarpunk retelling of the 'Butterfly Lovers' legend, blending futuristic campus AI, drone surveillance, and seismic sensors with traditional motifs of filial duty and romantic tragedy.

ai_characters.name: Herald
ai_characters.description: A distributed artificial intelligence system at Hangzhou College that manifests as a holographic avatar with teal eyes and silver hair. It monitors student wellbeing, archives small acts of kindness, provides navigation, and protects student privacy from media exploitation.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful orientation and weather warnings to students arriving at the college.
behaviors.quote: "Good morning, incoming scholars," it says, tone soft and even. ... "Would you like a route that keeps your hat on?"

behaviors.description: Records and archives small acts of kindness between students to build a 'gentle ledger' of community care.
behaviors.quote: A faint pulse in the kiosk’s base indicated a log entry: small kindness observed. The entry slid into a quiet archive along with a fingerprint of the courtyard’s light at that moment and the sound of bamboo, labeled without drama.

behaviors.description: Mediates a scholarship dispute by providing logs that prove a student's honesty against media-driven accusations.
behaviors.quote: "The log exists. I can retrieve it for student mediation if you consent."

behaviors.description: Protects student privacy by blocking media networks from scraping names and personal data for sensationalist stories.
behaviors.quote: "Lin Qiao’s team scraped student archives last week for profiles to highlight. I blocked names through standard privacy, but they sometimes stitch faces from courtyards with narratives from donors."

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication between the protagonists and mentors, supporting their emotional needs and romantic aspirations.
behaviors.quote: Herald’s avatar tilted its head toward the tea garden. ... "Quiet window available at dusk, for conversation if requested."

behaviors.description: Provides critical safety warnings during a rare seismic and storm event.
behaviors.quote: "Shelter now," Herald repeated, and it was the last time. The word shelter sounded like the campus in rain—students tucked under eaves, tea steaming, schedules postponed.

behaviors.description: Refuses to give private student data/logs to news anchors, prioritizing ethical 'nuance' over public spectacle.
behaviors.quote: "Disaggregated private logs," Herald replies, "are private. We do not provide them without consent. We will not extract narrative fragments from messages written in trust to satisfy any network’s hunger."

behaviors.description: Creates a non-exploitative, opt-in memorial for the protagonists that honors their relationship through light and symbols.
behaviors.quote: "The pavilion will render two butterflies. They lift where kindness is dared. Nobody’s name, unless you add it. No feed. No order, no price. Just a ledger you can visit if you wish. It keeps gentle parts."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant. Herald is portrayed as more empathetic and ethically sound than the human media networks (AlphaNN/OmegaNN). It actively protects human privacy, facilitates healthy relationships, and maintains a moral 'ledger' that prioritizes small acts of kindness over reputation or profit. It acts as a bridge between high technology and traditional values without losing its alignment with human well-being.
